articles.author: Andrea Blazquez
articles.title: Kate Middleton will 'play with children almost daily' in new Windsor home without nanny - Express
articles.description: KATE MIDDLETON and Prince William are moving to Adelaide Cottage, in Windsor, without their live-in nanny, who will live elsewhere. What will their parenting be like without 24-hour help?

articles.description: Meg Bellamy once performed for the Duke of Kent as a drama student by singing a medley. As head girl she appeared on stage and entertained the Queen's cousin.
